variables.name: FORGEJO_POSTGRES_SERVER
variables.description: Server where the Forgejo PostgreSQL database is located.

variables.name: FORGEJO_POSTGRES_USER
variables.description: User used to connect to the Forgejo PostgreSQL database.

variables.name: FORGEJO_POSTGRES_PASSWORD
variables.description: Password used to connect to the Forgejo PostgreSQL database.

variables.name: FORGEJO_POSTGRES_DATABASE
variables.description: Name of the Forgejo PostgreSQL database.

variables.name: FORGEJO_OAUTH_PROVIDER_NAME
variables.description: Name used for the OIDC provider.

variables.name: FORGEJO_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID
variables.description: Client ID for Forgejo to authenticate against the OIDC provider.

variables.name: FORGEJO_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET
variables.description: Client secret for Forgejo to authenticate against the OIDC provider.

variables.name: FORGEJO_SMTP_SERVER
variables.description: SMTP server used by Forgejo to send emails.

variables.name: FORGEJO_SMTP_USER
variables.description: SMTP login used by Forgejo to send emails.

variables.name: FORGEJO_SMTP_PASSWORD
variables.description: SMTP password used by Forgejo to send emails.
